def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper
widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("EXCLUIR_OPERACOESCONTABEIS") widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_OPERACOESCONTABEIS") widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_OPERACOESCONTABEIS")
